img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 61.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/db/Wukong_YellowFlower_61.jpg)
If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him.
img_below_text:
If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.
![Wukong YellowFlower 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_YellowFlower_63.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 59 from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 61.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/db/Wukong_YellowFlower_61.jpg)
If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him."
            - Following Text: "If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.
![Wukong YellowFlower 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_YellowFlower_63.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a combat encounter in a lush, forested environment. The player character, Wukong, is engaged in a battle with an enemy known as the "Supreme Inspector," who appears to be a formidable opponent with fiery and winged features. The preceding and following text suggests strategies for dealing with the enemy's aerial attacks and projectile assaults, emphasizing defensive maneuvers and counterattacks. This image serves to illustrate the intense and strategic nature of combat within the game.
